name: BlurHash

values.name: fromImage
values.comment: Encode an image as a blurhash. The `Image` type is from [`justgook/elm-image`](https://package.elm-lang.org/packages/justgook/elm-image/latest/)
values.type: { width : Basics.Int, height : Basics.Int } -> Image.Image -> String.String

values.name: fromPixels
values.type: { width : Basics.Int, height : Basics.Int } -> { rows : Basics.Int, columns : Basics.Int } -> Array.Array Color.Color -> String.String

values.name: toUri
values.comment:
Convert a blurhash into an image URI. The float parameter is the `punch`, used to increase/decrease contrast of the resulting image

    punch : Float
    punch =
        0.9

    hash : String
    hash =
        "UBL_:rOpGG-oBUNG,qRj2so|=eE1w^n4S5NH"

    BlurHash.toUri { width = 4, height = 4 } punch hash
    -->  "data:image/bmp;base64,Qk26AAAAAAAAAHoAAABsAAAABAAAAAQAAAABACAAAwAAAEAAAAATCwAAEwsAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA/wAA/wAA/wAA/wAAAFdpbiAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAD/WovA/0F+wv87fs3/UIXI/12Lxf85eMH/Q4DT/1iK0f9djrr/TYGy/0Z/uf9RhMD/UYWu/1OHr/9Bfqn/T4Gv"
values.type: { width : Basics.Int, height : Basics.Int } -> Basics.Float -> String.String -> String.String
